name: ext-db-migrate
description: DB migrations + RR-backed DB fixture adapter (contracts-as-data under arch/db).
docs:
Deterministic DB migration plans + RR cassette helpers pinned by arch/db contracts.

Modules:
- std.db.migrate
- std.db.rr
- std.db.migrate.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-db-migrate@0.1.3
- Use std.db.migrate.apply_from_arch_v1 with plans under arch/db.
